title: Sovereign AGI v94 Global Rule Set (GRS) Configuration Schema
description: Defines the mandatory structure and operational constraints for Sovereign AGI configuration rules, focusing on modularity, extensible rate limits, and auditable deployment settings.

version.description: Specific schema version identifier, locked to v94 branch.

rulesetName.description: Unique, descriptive name for the GRS configuration (PascalCase preferred).

enabledModules.description: List of validated system modules activated in this configuration.

rateLimits.description: Defines dynamic throttling policies indexed by resource/endpoint name.

securityContext.description: Defines the parameterized security constraints and policy reference.

operationalPolicy.description: Controls deployment strategies and auditing configurations.

ModuleIdentifier.description: Standard identifier for an operational module (PascalCase enforcement).

maxOperations.description: Maximum atomic operations allowed per window.

timeWindowMs.description: Duration in milliseconds for the throttling window.

policyReference.description: Path or identifier to the security policy file/resource (e.g., Zokrates proof artifact hash).

parameters.description: Specific parameterized overrides for the policy (e.g., minimum confidence score).

deploymentStrategy.description: Strategy for deploying this configuration change across the mesh.

level.description: Minimum logging verbosity for configuration application.

targets.description: External sinks for audit logs (e.g., storage paths, monitoring APIs).
